    • Method Detail

      • getDeviceHeightAboveGround

        public float getDeviceHeightAboveGround()
        Returns the estimated height at which the device is currently above the ground.
        Returns:
        the estimated height in meters.

      • setDeviceHeightAboveGround

        public void setDeviceHeightAboveGround(float height)
        Sets the estimated height at which the device is currently above the ground. Setting this to an appropriate value will allow the augmentations to have a scale close to the one they would have in reality. The default value is 1.4 (meters).
        Parameters:
        height - estimated height in meters

      • getTrackingPlaneOrientation

        public float getTrackingPlaneOrientation()
        Returns the initial orientation at which the instant tracking plane should be displayed.
        Returns:
        orientation angle in degree

      • setTrackingPlaneOrientation

        public void setTrackingPlaneOrientation(float orientation)
        Sets the initial orientation at which the instant tracking plane should be displayed. This can be used to align the instant tracking plane with real world structures (e.g. 0° for a floor, 90° for a vertical wall) The default value is 0° (floor aligned). Using this after the Tracker was created has no effect. This setting is not used when running InstantTracking with SMART.
        Parameters:
        orientation - angle in degree

      • setSMARTEnabled

        public void setSMARTEnabled(boolean enabled)
        Defines if the Wikitude SDk should use SMART instead of only the Wikitude InstantTracking algorithms if the device supports . This is enabled by default.
        Parameters:
        enabled - If SMART should be used.

      • isSMARTEnabled

        public boolean isSMARTEnabled()
        Returns if the Wikitude SDk should use SMART instead of only the Wikitude InstantTracking algorithms if the device supports SMART.
        Returns:
        If SMART should be used.

      • getTrackerEfficiencyMode

        public TrackerEfficiencyMode getTrackerEfficiencyMode()
        Returns the efficiency mode of the tracker. Please refer to the TrackerEfficiencyMode documentation for more details.

      • setTrackerEfficiencyMode

        public void setTrackerEfficiencyMode(TrackerEfficiencyMode trackerEfficiencyMode)
        Use this to specify the efficiency mode of the tracker. Please refer to the TrackerEfficiencyMode documentation for more details.
        Parameters:
        trackerEfficiencyMode - the tracker efficiency mode that should be used

      • getPlaneDetectionConfiguration

        public PlaneDetectionConfiguration getPlaneDetectionConfiguration()
        Returns the plane detection configuration of the tracker. Please refer to the PlaneDetectionConfiguration documentation for more details.

      • isPlaneDetectionEnabled

        public boolean isPlaneDetectionEnabled()
        Returns if plane detection is enabled.

      • enablePlaneDetection

        public void enablePlaneDetection(PlaneDetectionConfiguration planeDetectionConfiguration)
        Use this to specify whether the tracker should detect planes or not. Please refer to the PlaneDetectionConfiguration documentation for more details regarding how to customize plane detection.
        Parameters:
        planeDetectionConfiguration - The configuration for Plane detection.
